服す: (ふくす) - to obey/to submit/to defer/to yield/to abide; to serve (e.g. in the army, or a sentence in jail (gaol)); to observe (e.g. mourning); to drink (tea, medicine, etc.)
服する: (ふくする) - to obey/to submit/to defer/to yield/to abide; to serve (e.g. in the army, or a sentence in jail (gaol)); (also pronounced ぶくする) to observe (e.g. mourning); (also pronounced ぶくする) to drink (tea, medicine, etc.)
服む: (のむ) - (呑む is often used metaphorically; 服む is often used for medicine) to drink/to gulp/to swallow/to take (medicine); (also written 喫む)  to smoke (tobacco); to engulf/to overwhelm; to keep down/to suppress; to accept (e.g. demand, condition); to make light of/to conceal
服を汚す: (ふくをよごす) - to soil one's clothes
服務期間: (ふくむきかん) - period of work; period of service; tour of duty
服地: (ふくじ) - cloth; dress material; clothing fabric
服属: (ふくぞく) - a follower; yield allegiance to
服役: (ふくえき) - penal servitude; military service
服毒自殺: (ふくどくじさつ) - poison suicide; suicide by poisoning
服種: (ふくしゅ) - type of clothing; style of clothing; line of clothing
服紗: (ふくさ) - small silk wrapper; small cloth for wiping tea utensils; crepe wrapper
服罪: (ふくざい) - penal servitude/submitting to a sentence/pleading guilty; (伏罪 only)  undetected crime
服飾: (ふくしょく) - clothing and accessories; attire
服飾店: (ふくしょくてん) - clothing store; boutique; dress shop
服飾見本: (ふくしょくみほん) - fashion plate
朔: (さく) - Conjunction (astronomy) , new moon; first day of the lunar month; (na China antiga) next year's calendar and decrees (distributed by the Emperor at year's end)
朔日: (さくじつ) - (usu. 一日 or １日) first day of the month; (ついたち only)  first ten days of the lunar month
朔望: (さくぼう) - first and fifteenth days of the lunar month (corresponding to new moon and full moon)
朗らかに笑う: (ほがらかにわらう) - to smile brightly; to laugh merrily
朗朗: (ろうろう) - clear; sonorous; full-sounding; resonant; bright
朗詠: (ろうえい) - recitation (of Japanese or Chinese poem)
朗読会: (ろうどくかい) - recital; recitation; public reading
朗読ＣＤ: (ろうどくシーディー) - audiobook on a CDROM
望: (bou/mou/nozo) - hope , full moon; 15th day of the lunar month
望ましい: (のぞましい) - desirable; hoped for; preferable; advisable
望みが適う: (のぞみがかなう) - to have one's wish realized; to have one's wish realised
望みの綱: (のぞみのつな) - one's last hope; one's only hope; the last hope
望み次第: (のぞみしだい) - just as one wishes
望み薄: (のぞみうす) - faint hopes; dim prospects
望み見る: (のぞみみる) - to gaze into the distance
望み通り: (のぞみどおり) - just as one wishes
望む: (のぞむ) - to desire; to wish for/to expect; to see/to command (a view of)
望むらくは: (のぞむらくは) - I pray that; I wish that
望月: (ぼうげつ) - full moon/15th day of the lunar calendar; (もちづき only) full moon of the eighth lunar month
望楼: (ぼうろう) - watchtower; observation tower; lookout
望樓: (ぼうろう) - watchtower; observation tower; lookout
望潮: (シオマネキ) - fiddler crab (esp. species Uca arcuata)
望粥: (もちがゆ) - rice gruel with mochi; azuki bean gruel eaten around the 15th day of the first month
望遠: (ぼうえん) - seeing at a distance
望遠鏡座: (ぼうえんきょうざ) - {astron} Telescopium (constellation); the Telescope
望遠魚: (ボウエンギョ) - telescopefish (Giganturidae spp., esp. species Gigantura chuni)
望郷の念: (ぼうきょうのねん) - sense of nostalgia
朝々暮々: (ちょうちょうぼぼ) - (yoji) every morning and evening
朝っぱらから: (あさっぱらから) - early in the morning
朝な夕な: (あさなゆうな) - morning and evening
朝ぼらけ: (あさぼらけ) - light of dawn; daybreak
朝まだき: (あさまだき) - early morning (before the break of dawn)
朝シャン: (あさシャン) - shampooing in the morning
朝ドラ: (あさドラ) - morning soap opera; morning television serial
朝マラ: (あさマラ) - morning wood; morning erection
朝マラの立たぬ男に金貸すな: (あさマラのたたぬおとこにかねかすな) - (proverb) don't lend money to a man who doesn't have an erection in the morning (because he's not healthy and might die before he can repay)
朝一: (あさいち) - first thing in the morning
朝一番: (あさいちばん) - first thing in the morning
朝三暮四: (ちょうさんぼし) - (yoji) being preoccupied with immediate (superficial) differences without realizing that there are no differences in substance
朝令暮改: (ちょうれいぼかい) - (yoji) an unsettled course of action; (orders or laws) being revised often with no guiding principles
朝凪: (あさなぎ) - morning calm (over the ocean)
